channel.title: GladeonRSPS.com | 718 | stable economy
channel.description:
Welcome to the Gladeon 718 Advertisment thread.
Gladeon is a server that is stable and growing fast.
Website : http://gladeonrsps.com Client Download : http://gladeonrsps.com/Gladeon.jar Webclient : [url=http://gladeonrsps.com/play/]http://gladeonrsps.com/play/[/url]
We include : -VPS HOSTED DDOS PROTECTED -Slayer -Farming -Auto donate -Vote4Cash - Custom home - Jad - Fight pits - Fight Kiln - Stable economy - Dwarf cannon - Starter tutorial -fairy rings - Skilling - PvM - Duel arena - Bones on altar - Chaotics - Active owner - Daily updates Training areas] - Yaks - Cows - Goblins & Guards - Mans Bosses : - Corporal beast - Nex - Bandos - Armadyl - Zamorak - Saradomin - Jad - Adding more soon.
